about.description:
GMSO is designed to enable the flexible, general representation of chemical
topologies for molecular simulation. Efforts are made to enable lossless,
bias-free storage of data, without assuming particular chemistries, models,
or using any particular engine's ecosystem as a starting point.
about.summary: Flexible storage of chemical topology for molecular simulation.

about.description:
GMSO is designed to enable the flexible, general representation of chemical
topologies for molecular simulation. Efforts are made to enable lossless,
bias-free storage of data, without assuming particular chemistries, models,
or using any particular engine's ecosystem as a starting point.
about.summary: Flexible storage of chemical topology for molecular simulation.

name: gmso
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "gmso" %}
{% set version = "0.9.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/mosdef-hub/gmso/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 0aeafdba897dc8a96ecc0f18553d9faa50c24aa97fabe6cbf5e008f74f9b0d2a

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python >=3.8
    - setuptools
  run:
    - boltons
    - lxml
    - numpy
    - sympy
    - unyt
    - python >=3.8
    - pydantic >1.8
    - foyer >=0.11.3
    - forcefield-utilities >=0.2.1
    - networkx
    - ele >=0.2.0
    - setuptools

test:
  imports:
    - gmso

about:
  home: https://github.com/mosdef-hub/gmso
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE.rst
  summary: Flexible storage of chemical topology for molecular simulation.

  description: |
    GMSO is designed to enable the flexible, general representation of chemical
    topologies for molecular simulation. Efforts are made to enable lossless,
    bias-free storage of data, without assuming particular chemistries, models,
    or using any particular engine's ecosystem as a starting point.
  doc_url: https://gmso.mosdef.org/
  dev_url: https://github.com/mosdef-hub/gmso

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bdice
    - justinGilmer
    - umesh-timalsina
    - daico007
    - rmatsum836
    - uppittu11
